hooks.command:
# Prevent editing on main branch
[ "$(git branch --show-current)" != "main" ] || { echo '{"block": true, "message": "Cannot edit files on main branch. Create a feature branch first with: git checkout -b your-branch-name"}' >&2; exit 2; }

# Auto-format with Biome for supported files
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" =~ \.(js|jsx|ts|tsx|json|css)$ ]]; then
  npx biome format --write "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" 2>&1
  if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
    echo '{"feedback": "Formatted with Biome.", "suppressOutput": true}'
  else
    echo '{"feedback": "Format check found issues."}' >&2
  fi
fi

# Type-check TypeScript files
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" =~ \.(ts|tsx)$ ]]; then
  echo '{"feedback": "Checking TypeScript types..."}' >&2
  output=$(npx tsc --noEmit 2>&1)
  exit_code=$?
  if [ $exit_code -eq 0 ]; then
    echo '{"feedback": "No TypeScript errors.", "suppressOutput": true}'
  else
    errors=$(echo "$output" | grep -E "error TS" | head -10)
    if [ -n "$errors" ]; then
      echo "{\"feedback\": \"TypeScript errors found - please review.\"}" >&2
      echo "$errors" >&2
    fi
  fi
  exit 0
fi

# Validate MDX frontmatter
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" =~ \.mdx$ ]]; then
  if ! head -1 "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" | grep -q '^---$'; then
    echo '{"feedback": "Warning: MDX file should start with frontmatter (---)"}' >&2
  fi
fi
